About

That's right. I am passionate about Maths and Technologies. I have strong and proficient academic background with analytical and problem-solving skills. I am currently looking to learn software skills and utilise mathematical techniques to solve real world problems.

I believe programming requires creative thinking. Software developers can code forever and never stop progressing, which is very interesting to me. I love challenges and resolve problems. That's why, I think programming is a lot of fun. There are always problems and technologies that can challenge our mind. Also, no matter where you learn it, it stays the same everywhere you go and it is compatible with whatever passions you might have.

Another thing that I am passionate about, is tutoring Maths. I have over ten years teaching experience. I love helping my students understand concepts deeply, and solve challenging questions. I always try to search for great methods and strategies that can help me to be a better tutor.
